narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Goshen Healthcare & Management Services is a Community/Behavioral Health provider based in Washington, DC. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $18.2M in Medicaid payments across 196K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $18.2M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
